articles.title: DFRK Exposes True Colors of U.S.-S. Korea Alliance
articles.content:
DFRK Exposes True Colors of U.S.-S. Korea Alliance
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) Tuesday released a memorandum showing the history and true colors of the U.S.-south Korea alliance as regards the fact that the south Korean puppet regime has gotten more hell-bent on sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the fellow countrymen and anti-DPRK war moves while crying out for strengthened alliance with the U.S.
					 Terming the U.S.-south Korea alliance a master-servant tie-up, an inequitable alliance based on subjugation and submission and a war alliance for carrying out the U.S. policy of aggression, the memorandum said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists landed in south Korea on September 8, 1945 to replace the Japanese imperialist aggressors defeated in the Second World War and then proclaimed their military administration, enforcing the colonial government-general rule through it.
					
					 They staged the ruinous "separate elections" in May of 1948 and set up the Syngman Rhee puppet regime in August that year.
					
					 After the emergence of the puppet regime, various "agreements" and "treaties" were concluded under the coercion and wire-pulling of the U.S., and they all were no more than nooses to colonialize south Korea as a whole in political, economic and military aspects.
					
					 On August 24, 1948, the U.S. egged traitor Syngman Rhee on to sign the "status of forces agreement on tentative military affair and security in transitional period" in a bid to justify its military occupation system.
					
					 Under this "agreement" the U.S. offered the puppet army huge munitions enough to arm tens of thousands of troops, many weapons seized from the defeated Japanese imperialists and U.S.-made warplanes and warships so as to make preparations for an aggression on the northern half of Korea.
					
					 The U.S., which ignited the Korean War on June 25, 1950, cooked up an "agreement on jurisdiction over the U.S. forces in south Korea" in July to put the prerogative of the puppet army, including the right to command operation, under its control.
					
					 Due to this "agreement" the south Korean puppet army was enrolled into the "UN forces" and the commander of the "UN forces" exercised full command over the puppet army.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea "mutual defense treaty" was officially signed in Washington on October 1, 1953. The "treaty" in its article 4 calls for conferring on the U.S. the right to deploy its three services in any part of south Korea. The article 6 stipulates the "treaty" as "indefinitely valid" so as to "justify" the U.S. forces' permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 The "treaty" is the worst unequal and shackling one, quite different from similar treaties the U.S. concluded with other countries, as it gives no restriction to the U.S. in reducing south Korea to its military bases, allowing its military presence for an indefinite period.
					
					 The U.S. fabricated the U.S.-south Korea "agreed minutes", a supplementary agreement of the "mutual defense treaty", in November of 1954 and reaffirmed its permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea alliance has recorded the history of aggression, war, plunder and subjugation for the last seven decades since the U.S. imperialist aggressors' occupation of south Korea.
					
					 After issuing the "joint statement" of the puppet regime and the "UN Command" in May, 1961, the U.S. stepped up the preparations for war of aggression against the DPRK by continuing to seize the right to command operations of the commander of the "UN forces" over the puppet army, investing a huge amount of funds for beefing up armed forces for aggression and intensifying war drills. 
					
					 On the strength of the alliance, the U.S. imperialists hurled troops of the south Korean puppet army, colonial mercenaries, as cannon fodder into shambles of wars of aggression, large and small, ignited by them in different parts of the world.
					
					 On July 9, 1966 the U.S. faked up the SOFA, giving the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea privileged position rare to be found in the world.
					
					 On the strength of the humiliating SOFA the U.S. imperialist aggressors have made no scruple of perpetrating murder, rape, plunder, destruction and all other crimes in south Korea.
					
					 In December, 1994 the U.S. staged a farce of transferring the peacetime operation control to the puppet forces but it was a crafty artifice to quell the people's anti-American sentiment and desire for independence and calm down the criticism at home and abroad of the U.S. military presence in south Korea and colonial domination over it.
					
					 It declared transfer of OPECON in April, 2012 but installed a pro-U.S. conservative regime, instigating it to repeatedly extend the transfer.
					
					 Through deceptive "aid" it strengthened the system of neo-colonialist domination over south Korean economy.
					
					 In the mid-1960s the U.S. put the bulk of financial budget and banking funds of south Korea under its control and monopolized 70-80 percent of supply of raw materials and 80 percent of trade.
					
					 The U.S. forced south Korea open its market, deepening economic infiltration into the latter and its dependence on the former.
					
					 It cooked up the humiliating FTA, putting south Korea deep into colonial yoke.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative group is making last-ditch efforts to prolong its despicable remaining days in reliance on the alliance with the U.S.
					
					 What the present puppet regime has done so far since it came to power was the acts of making south Korea increasingly dependent on the U.S., crying out for tightened alliance with the U.S., and the ones of putting the inter-Korean relations into the worst catastrophe through cooperation in confrontation with the DPRK and moves to invade it.
					
					 No matter how loudly the puppet group may advertise the U.S.-south Korea alliance, regarding it as its lifeline and kowtowing to the U.S., the U.S. considers the puppet forces as nothing but a colonial servant.
					
					 As long as there exists the U.S.-south Korea alliance, the south Korean people can never free a miserable fate, the danger of a war can hardly be defused on the Korean peninsula and it is hard to expect either peace or the reunification of the country.
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea alliance, shame on the nation and obstacle to peace and reunification, should be dissolved without delay, the memorandum demanded.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Warns of Resolute Action against Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Warns of Resolute Action against Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Campaign
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime again joined the U.S. in adopting the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" at the 28th session of the UN Human Rights Council together with its allies, a "resolution" aimed to hurt the dignity and social system of the DPRK. Such behavior is now enraging all Koreans.
					 Announcing that south Korea "co-sponsored" the "resolution", the puppet regime stated that it hails the adoption of the "resolution" and "expects the UN Security Council to play a sustainable and positive role over the north's human rights issue". It went the lengths of demanding the "implementation of recommended provisions."
					
					 Besides, the regime disclosed its scheme to set up a UN "office for human rights in the north" in Seoul soon and intensify the international anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 In this regard the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued its information bulletin No. 1088 on Mar. 30, which said:
					
					 It is the foulest anti-national crime that could be committed only by the group of heinous traitors keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen, and this is another unpardonable grave provocation and blatant challenge to the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The "resolution", railroaded by the U.S. and its followers through the UN Human Rights Council recently, is a heinous politically-motivated fraudulent document for aggression intended to hurt the dignity and prestige of the DPRK and topple its social system.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for the south Korean puppet regime to pull up the DPRK over its "human rights" performance.
					
					 What should be taken issue at present is the worst human rights situation in south Korea, a colony of the U.S.
					
					 It is the reality of south Korea that those protesting against the U.S. war drills for invasion of the DPRK and praising their fellow countrymen and calling for national harmony and reunification become a target of harsh suppression, after being branded as "terrorist" and "forces following the north".
					
					 As the spies of its Intelligence Service confessed recently after being arrested in the DPRK, the south Korean puppet regime has made no scruple of committing terrorism to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and bring down its social system under the manipulation of the U.S. Therefore, its call for "human rights improvement" is an intolerable insult and mockery of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate the U.S. and south Korea's reckless anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign aimed to hurt the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its social system but take a staunch action against them.
					
					 In particular, now that the puppet regime seeks to set up a UN "office for human rights in the north", a plot-breeding body, in Seoul so as to turn south Korea into an international hotbed of crimes against the DPRK, it will never overlook this attempt and such office will be the first target of its merciless punishment and strike immediately the office is set up in south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
articles.content:
DPRK Olympic Committee Meets
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The general meeting of the DPRK Olympic Committee-Juche 104 (2015) took place on Tuesday.
					 Present there were members of the committee and officials in the sports field and those in relevant fields.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work of the committee for 2014 and discussed the orientation of its work for 2015.
					
					 Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports who doubles as chairman of the DPRK Olympic Committee, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 They recalled that Marshal Kim Jong Un made sure that the Seventh National Conference of Sportspeople was held and sent a historic letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu" to those attending the conference and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Sportspersons won victories by playing by the methods of Korean style in the 17th Asian Games and world championships last year, exalting the honor of the country and greatly encouraging the service personnel and people out in the drive for defending socialism, they noted.
					
					 With the National Inter-Provincial Games-14 and domestic sports games as momentums, the hot wind of sports swept all over the country and many achievements were made in sports scientific researches, they said.
					
					 They underlined the need to direct efforts to mass sports and development of technique of each sports event.
					
					 They called for boosting cooperation with international sports bodies and registering greater achievements in sports.

articles.title: Enlarged Plenary Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Plenary Meetings of Working People's Organizations Held
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The 78th enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, the 56th enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the 70th enlarged plenary meeting of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea took place in Pyongyang and Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province on Tuesday. 
					 Present there were members and alternate members of the central committees of the above-said organizations and officials in Pyongyang and local areas. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of devotedly carrying out the important tasks set forth in the historic conclusion made by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the general federation of trade unions, Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the C.C., the youth league, and Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, made reports to be followed by speeches. 
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Un's historic conclusion serves as an important guideline and militant banner that the Korean people should hold fast to in the struggle for carrying out the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They analyzed and reviewed successes and experience made in the dynamic struggle for thoroughly carrying out the behests of Kim Jong Il, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un during the past three years and referred to the tasks and ways of the working people's organizations to implement the tasks set forth in his historic conclusion.

articles.title: Activities of RC Delegation in DPRK on World Water Day
articles.content:
Activities of RC Delegation in DPRK on World Water Day 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the DPRK Tuesday visited the township of Sinyang County, South Phyongan Province to mark World Water Day (March 22).
					 It was greeted by officials of the Sinyang County branch of the DPRK Red Cross Society, young RC volunteers and other volunteers and inhabitants.
					
					 A branch official briefed the delegation on the projects for water hygiene, public health and disaster prevention carried out in the area under the Federation assistance and their results.
					
					 The delegation also had field survey and home visits before watching a hygienic information service conducted by volunteers among inhabitants and an art performance given by students on the theme of hygienic information.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau recently issued a new stamp encouraging the people to implement the joint slogans set forth by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea to mark the 70th anniversaries of the liberation of the country and the founding of the WPK.
					 Depicted in the stamp is a soldier-builder replete with the resolution to thoroughly implement the joint slogans against the background of the emblem of the WPK and banners bearing letters "Campaign for implementing the Party's ideas" and "Campaign for upholding the Party's policies".
					
					 Seen on its lower part is a slogan "Let us greet the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and Party founding with high political enthusiasm and brilliant labor feats!"
					
					 The stamp well shows the will of the DPRK servicepersons and civilians to significantly celebrate the country's anniversaries in hearty response to the WPK's calls.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful in Women's Volleyball Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful in Women's Volleyball Tournament
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 9th VTV-Binh Dien International Women's Volleyball Cup held in Vietnam from Mar. 21 to 29.
					 It brought together volleyball teams of the DPRK, Kazakhstan, Malaysia and other countries.
					
					 The April 25 Team of the DPRK trounced its Kazakh rival 3:0 in the semi-finals. 
					
					 It defeated the Vietnam Team LVPB 3:1 in the finals.

articles.title: Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt. Paektu Area Visited by Many Service Personnel and People
articles.content:
Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt. Paektu Area Visited by Many Service Personnel and People
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- On April 1 last year Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un met and encouraged commanding officers of combined units of the KPA who participated in the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in Mt. Paektu area.
					 The revolutionary battle sites are associated with the undying revolutionary histories of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary traditions of Juche.
					
					 More than 2 700 organizations from across the country made study tour of the revolutionary battle sites for the past one year.
					
					 The tour made by the commanding officers of combined units of the KPA was followed by many organizations and masses including model service personnel, school youth and children, officials and members of the trade unions and the women's union, leading party officials, officials and information workers of primary organizations of the agricultural workers' union and media persons.
					
					 Service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, weathering blizzards of Mt. Paektu, deeply grasped the greatness of Kim Il Sung who led the great anti-Japanese war to a victory.
					
					 Leading officials in charge of administrative affairs from across the country renewed their will to embody the noble spirit of the revolutionary forerunners in their on-going drive.
					
					 Among those attending the study tour were officials, workers, teachers and students of the Hyesan Youth Mine, Pyongyang Department Store No. 1, Changgwang Public Service Management Bureau, Phyongsong University of Medicine, Hyesan University of Agriculture and Forestry and various other units.
					
					 Officials, party members and other people and school youth and children from South and North Phyongan, Jagang, South and North Hamgyong and other provinces renewed their will to carry on the long journey for the Songun revolution to the end.

articles.title: Rooms for Sci-tech Knowledge Proved Effective in DPRK
articles.content:
Rooms for Sci-tech Knowledge Proved Effective in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rooms for disseminating sci-tech knowledge have been built in many industrial establishments of the DPRK, proving effective in increasing production and improving the quality of products.
					 In this regard KCNA met Kim Hyon, manager of the Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited my factory in early February this year and stressed the need for the factory to operate the room for disseminating sci-tech knowledge in an effective way so as to help employees enrich their technical knowledge and develop skills.
					
					 The room for disseminating sci-tech knowledge in the factory plays a big role in improving the quality of cosmetics.
					
					 In the room, employees of the factory can get tele-education given by Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 A local area network was also built up in the factory with a database created.
					
					 Kim Yung Gi, master of the Songrim Harbor, said the room for disseminating sci-tech knowledge is in normal operation at the harbor to help employees acquire latest technologies.
					
					 Such rooms have also been built at the Pyongyang Thermal-power Complex, Hamhung Woolen Mill, Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and other units.

articles.title: Force-Measuring Instrument Developed
articles.content:
Force-Measuring Instrument Developed
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Automation Institute under the DPRK State Academy of Sciences has recently developed a force-measuring instrument.
					 Simple in its structure and operation, the instrument helps correctly measure the locomotion capacity of athletes in any place at any time.
					
					 It is able to measure in real time the momentary force displayed by an athlete.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams European Countries' Plan to Sell Attack Helicopters to S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams European Countries' Plan to Sell Attack Helicopters to S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the European munitions business Airbus Helicopters decided to sell hundreds of attack helicopters to the south Korean puppet forces.
					 This is an extremely dangerous action to egg the south Korean puppet forces on to the confrontation with the DPRK and escalate the danger of a new war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 As already known, south Korea has turned into the world's largest nuclear outpost, a hotbed of a nuclear war, an exhibition ground and test site of new type weapons owing to the U.S.
					
					 Huge quantities of latest war hardware have been deployed in south Korea. Among them are U-2, Patriot 3, Longbow AH-64D copters, ATACMS Block 2 and ATACMS Block 1A, M1-A1 tanks, U-2 S Block 20, F-117 stealth fighter bombers.
					
					 The U.S. has stockpiled 600 000 tons of war supplies and stored 3 million of depleted uranium shells in such U.S. air force bases as those in Osan, Suwon and Chongju of south Korea in particular.
					
					 It decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea and is staging war drills under the simulated conditions of an actual war almost every day with the involvement of huge war hardware including littoral combat ship Fort Worth designed to suit the sea-bed conditions in the vicinity of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is none other than the peninsula into which latest weapons are being shipped, pursuant to the U.S. policy for aggression against the DPRK and its ambition to dominate the world. A nuclear war may break out any moment on the peninsula as the density of nuclear weapons deployment there has reached the highest in the world.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the European countries are mulling massively selling new-type attack helicopters to south Korea.  This is a criminal act of inciting a war, pursuant to the U.S. policy of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					  It is no more than a suicidal act that the European countries are following the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and war moves against it.
					
					 Some countries in Europe are being censured and ridiculed by the international community as marionettes of the White House for blindly following the U.S. scenario.
					
					 They have earned an ill-fame as "human rights abusers" for conspiring with the CIA in tortures against prisoners and joining in the conspiratorial human rights racket of the U.S. administration.
					
					 They are finding themselves in the most serious dilemma since the end of the Cold War, hit hard by the financial and economic crises and debt crisis in the U.S. while taking advantage of its bubble economy. They are still suffering from their aftereffects. The number of the poor has gone beyond 100 million among the member countries of the EU in 2014.
					
					 Since the crisis took place in Ukraine, they joined in the sanctions against Russia, suffering huge economic losses.
					
					 What the EU member countries got by toeing the U.S. wrong policy is their tarnished image in the international arena. The whole of Europe has been plunged into the crucible of confusion and confrontation and the EU is divided and euro region is in the danger of collapse.
					
					 They vociferated about the "peace preservation" and claimed as if they had made a great contribution to peace and stability of the world and behaved themselves as if they would not pardon any slight acts of wrecking peace. But they are now zealously following the U.S. policy for aggression.
					
					 With their hypocritical nature laid bare, their true colors as criminals disturbing global peace and stability have been fully disclosed in the eyes of the world.
					
					 With no rhetoric can European countries justify their wrong actions to escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula while currying favor and following such war maniac and war criminal state as the U.S.
					
					 The peace and stability on the peninsula and the world can never be achieved by talking alone.
					
					 European countries should make a contribution to peace through such practical actions as canceling the projected sale of attack helicopters to south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday devotes an article to the second anniversary of the strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force adopted at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The line reflects the fixed faith and will of Marshal Kim Jong Un to bolster up in every way the nuclear force for self-defence based on the transparent idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on national independence and the history of their Songun revolutionary leadership and to conclude the stand-off with the U.S. and build a reunified prosperous, most powerful country, the people's paradise on this land at an early date, the article says.
					
					 The past two years witnessed the exciting days when the validity and vitality of the line have been clearly proved, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear force has been bolstered up to be a nuclear treasured sword of justice equipped with higher comprehensive performance and the building of nuclear force became a permanent revolutionary strategy under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un. As a result, the DPRK made a breakthrough in the world political structure centered on the existing nuclear powers and towered as a powerful country steering the trend of international politics.
					
					 The reality proves that the final victory in the building of a thriving nation lies in thoroughly implementing the above-said line.
					
					 In order to dynamically keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, it is necessary to take firm hold on the invincible line and fully apply it to the struggle for building a thriving nation. Herein lies a sure guarantee for the final victory of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Papers Slam Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon
articles.content:
Papers Slam Japan's Crackdown upon Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries searched the houses of the chairman and the vice-chairman of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) by mobilizing police gangsters on March 26. The chairman and the vice-chairman are deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Papers Tuesday in commentaries say that the brigandish action is a serious infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and touches off resentment of the Korean people.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun notes:
					
					 The incident goes to clearly prove that the Japanese reactionaries, regarding the DPRK and Chongryon as a thorn in their flesh, have become ever more desperate in their provocation. And the improvement of DPRK-Japan relations touted by them is no more than a fig-leaf to cover up their sinister intention.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' action was an unprecedented violation of law, serious human rights abuse and politically-motivated fascist crackdown.  
					
					 The incident was aimed to fan up anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon sentiment in the Japanese society in a bid to quell the strong demand of the Korean nation and world public opinion for honest settlement of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and justify their policy of lurch to the right.
					
					 Lurking behind this action was a political intention of dishonest forces to deliberately throw an obstacle to the trend of the era towards improving the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities truly want the improved DPRK-Japan relations, they should ponder over the prevailing situation which may hurt the fate of the DPRK-Japan relations, and make a solemn apology to Chongryon and the DPRK for the recent search.
					
					 Minju Joson urges the Japanese reactionaries to stop at once the despicable crackdown upon Chongryon, clearly mindful that with nothing can they infringe upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and destabilize and destroy Chongryon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Park Geun Hye's Call for "North's Denuclearization"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Park Geun Hye's Call for "North's Denuclearization"
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean chief executive at a meeting with Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida and other diplomatic chiefs of neighboring countries at Chongwadae implored them to make efforts for "pressuring the north to make substantial progress in denuclearization," letting loose a litany of rhetoric that the settlement of the nuclear issue would contribute not only to the "stable development of the south-north relations" but also to the "stable situation in Northeast Asia".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 She revealed once again the wicked intention of the puppet group to hurt, isolate and stifle the fellow countrymen in the north at any cost by soliciting cooperation from foreign forces in the nuclear racket against it.
					
					 Questioning her how can her call for "the north's denuclearization" aimed at the latter's unilateral disarmament and invasion against it help develop the north-south relations and ensure regional peace and stability, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean chief executive's disclosure of her confrontational intention to hurt the north's self-respect over its nuclear issue would only result in further bedeviling the strained inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The puppet group's moves to "pressurize the north to carry out denuclearization" designed to realize the ambition for invading it through cooperation with foreign forces will only deepen the distrust and confrontation between the compatriots in the north and the south and trigger off unstable situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region, far from "making a contribution to the development of the south-north relations" and "the stability of the situation in Northeast Asia."
					
					 It was the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces who spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and blocked its settlement and are going busy with the moves to ignite a nuclear war against the north.
					
					 In the final analysis, her remarks were nothing but a revelation of her criminal plot to step up the moves for stifling the DPRK and igniting a nuclear war against it while justifying the nuclear racket against it and clinging to the coattails of foreign forces.
					
					 The puppet forces' vociferous call for the "denuclearization of the north" would get them nowhere.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to awake from their daydream and abandon their bad habit of relying on outsiders and pursuing confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Empire of Dollars Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Empire of Dollars Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. secretary of Treasury, addressing the Financial Service Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives recently, uttered that if U.S. Congress does not approve the reform of such relevant bodies as the IMF, the U.S. position may be threatened at international bodies. He underscored the necessity of the reform, asserting that it is the best way of keeping the "leading role" of the U.S. in the IMF and it is aimed to protect the interests of U.S. economy and national security.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 What the U.S. secretary of Treasury said at the Congress was nothing but a shriek to prevent the leading position of dollars, the U.S. domination position in the world financial circle from rapidly collapsing.
					
					 The U.S. domination position is bound to collapse though the IMF is reformed and it is bound to decline though the IMF is not reformed.
					
					 Dollars have already lost its monopoly position as the world's key reserve currency. Many countries are boycotting dollars at present.
					
					 Not a few countries are conducting trade settlements with uniform regional currency instead of dollars.
					
					 European enterprises are decreasing dependence on U.S. dollars. Even U.S. enterprises are making settlements in trade by foreign currency, not by their own currency.
					
					  As seen above, the U.S. currency is being rejected worldwide.
					
					 Many countries of the world are set not to tolerate the U.S. financial sanctions any longer.
					
					 Many countries are rejecting with vigilance the U.S. using its currency as a lever for bringing down the social systems of other countries and realizing "liberalization."
					
					 The world is turning back on U.S. dollars, awakened from illusion about them.
					
					 The U.S., the empire of dollars, is bound to go bankrupt.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. and Some European Countries as Worst Human Rights Abusers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. and Some European Countries as Worst Human Rights Abusers 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is the worst abuser of human rights in the world as it imprisons innocent people without trial and puts them to torture with no qualms under the pretext of "anti-terror war", Rodong Sinmun says in a commentary on Tuesday.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Torture is evidently a human rights abuse as it is the act of causing physical and mental pain to force someone to make confession and statement. 
					
					 The U.S. uses unimaginable brutal methods of torture such as water boarding, rectal feeding, 200-hour locking of captive in U-type box and pushing captive's head against a wall and beating at overseas secret prisons in different parts of the world. Even some captives died due to such brutal torture. 
					
					 Many Americans are meeting deaths simply because of different races and religions. 
					
					 Conflict among races has festered under the Obama administration. Discriminations against black people and Muslims are very serious in the U.S. 
					
					 What is stunning the people is that UK and other European countries styling themselves as "models of human rights" provide the U.S. with secret prisons and interrogation places and allow the passage and stay of prisoners in their countries to actively join the U.S. in human rights abuses. These facts prove that "human rights" advertised by European countries are nothing but hypocrisy and they are as cruel human rights abusers as the U.S.
					
					 It is the height of shamelessness and mockery and insult to genuine human rights for the U.S. and its allies, Western countries, to vociferate about "human rights issues" of other countries. 
					
					 They have neither face nor qualifications to make much fuss about "human rights issues" of other countries.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Raking up Huge Profits through Arms Export
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Raking up Huge Profits through Arms Export
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Swedish strategic affairs institute in its report said that the U.S. tops the world's list of arms export. According to the report, arms import over the past five years increased 54 percent in the Mideast alone, which massively imports U.S. arms. 
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This revealed once again the U.S. true colors as the arch criminal disturbing the world peace and stability.
					
					 The U.S. hell-bent on making profits through arms deal is showing extra zeal in its arms export, creating every opportunity, not content with taking it.
					
					 The U.S. loudly advertises that drones are the most effective weapons in routing terrorists. Not a few countries spend a huge amount of funds for buying U.S.-made drones.
					
					 It is reported that the U.S., real manipulator of the crisis in Ukraine, provided Patriot missiles to the NATO's military exercise staged against the background of the military confrontation between Russia and NATO festering day by day to get another windfall.
					
					 The U.S. is meeting its interests through bloodshed.
					
					 Some times ago, the Arabic newspaper Al-Arab published in Britain said that it is none other than the U.S. which has raked up the biggest profits through the anti-terror war that has lasted for more than a decade.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the world called the U.S. arms export "the export of conflict" long ago. The U.S. which has grown corpulent through ceaseless invasions and wars is still prolonging its existence at the cost of blood shed by other countries and nations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work 
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea is the eternal guiding principles and ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article dedicated to the 33rd anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea".
					
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), serves as an immortal encyclopedia as it comprehensively deals with the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The work is the cream of Kim Jong Il's intense loyalty to the President and the most precious ideological and theoretical wealth provided by Kim Jong Il for the times and the revolution, the country and its people, the article notes.
					
					 The decades since the publication of the work are a period in which the truth and invincible vitality of the Juche idea have been fully demonstrated, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has dynamically advanced along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, demonstrating its might as an invincible power with high international authority and dignity. This is the brilliant fruition of the Juche idea and the Songun idea based on it. The Juche idea is, indeed, the most scientific and revolutionary, great guiding idea in the era of independence which helps demonstrate the independent dignity of the country and the nation and achieve the prosperity for all ages. This is the historic review of the Korean revolution which has recorded only victories and glory.
					
					 The Juche idea founded and developed in depth by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is shedding its rays as the banner of victory and prosperity in the advance in the new century of Juche.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK are now living and struggling, becoming true comrades and comrades-in-arms sharing the idea and intention with Marshal Kim Jong Un, breathing the same breath with him and getting united around the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea as the single-mindedly united ranks. Korean-style socialism under which the noble ideal of the Juche idea is pulsating will win only victories, not losing its dynamism and vitality but firmly defending its nature.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Homemade Products
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Increasing Homemade Products
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- It is an economic policy of the Workers' Party of Korea to be consistently held fast to  from the early period of building a prosperous country to produce and ensure material requirements needed for building the economy and improving the people's living standard, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Producing everything itself by using the resources of the country and efforts of the people is a prerequisite to fully ensuring the sovereignty of the country and the nation and achieving genuine prosperity.
					
					The present drive for increasing homemade products means a death-defying campaign to defend the lifeline of socialist independent economy.
					
					 A general offensive is now under way to usher in a period of great prosperity of Songun Korea by its own efforts. Therefore, what should be guarded against at present is the tendency of depending on import.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are limiting and prohibiting dealings in all fields from materials needed for people's life to important industrial equipment and latest technology against the DPRK and working craftily to sell their surplus goods and bad goods to it.
					
					 This is aimed at weakening the might of the DPRK's independent economy, drawing water to its mill and putting the economy under its control.
					
					 The hostile forces' moves are no less heinous economic aggression and violent moves to stifle the nation than military aggression.
					
					 The matter of increasing homemade products is not a simple economic business issue to economize foreign currency and boost production. Our life, the future of our generation and the destiny of our-style socialism hinge on it.
					
					 Firm is the determination of the WPK to produce more and faster our things of world standard and build a socialist paradise in our generation at any cost where the people's dream and ideal have come true.
					
					 Let us share the idea, breath and steps with the Central Committee of the WPK to make the beloved country prosper forever.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action Headquarters for Increasing Public Pension in south Korea made up of more than 50 government employees and teachers organizations held a large-scale rally in Seoul on March 28 to denounce the puppet forces for working hard to retrogressively revise pension for government employees, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					Attending it were more than 80,000 government employees and teachers from across south Korea.
					
					 At the rally speakers condemned the Park Geun Hye regime for working hard to make a reform of pension for government employees aimed to cut down their pension.
					
					 They cannot remain a passive onlooker to the end of the workers' life caused by Park Geun Hye, they said, calling for turning out with strong resolution in the action to judge the present regime.
					
					 They also called for eliminating a handful of conservative ruling forces and plutocrats and protecting people's right to existence through the anti-"government" actions.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants waged a demonstration in protest against the unpopular rule of the Park Geun Hye group.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
 Pyongyang, March 29 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" on March 25.
					 The talk, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il, clarifying the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks for brilliantly accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Paper of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried by Paper of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of President Kim Il Sung was carried by La Prosperite, the paper of DR Congo, on March 25.
					 The paper carried a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Posted by German Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website on March 27 the full text of "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of Building a Sports Power in the Revolutionary Spirit of Paektu", a letter sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the Seventh National Conference of Sportspeople.
					 The work, published on March 25, Juche 104 (2015), refers to the fact that the Workers' Party of Korea is directing great efforts to the sports field in order to develop the country's sports in line with President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's idea and intention to build the Juche-based sports, and indicates the tasks and ways to successfully carry out the party's plan for building a sports power.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Angolan Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Angolan Body
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The noble feats President Kim Il Sung performed by devoting his all to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and the victory of the cause of global independence all his life will always go down in history.
					 The Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said this in a statement issued on March 26 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The President led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate the country after embarking upon the road of the revolution in his early years and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea and applied it to revolutionary practice, making sure that the popular masses creditably played their role as masters in hewing out their own destiny, and set an example in Korea.
					
					 He extended full support to the cause of the Angolan people for national liberation and the building of a new society and powerfully encouraged the world progressives in their struggle for independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Germany and round-table talks in Ethiopia and Angola on March 24 and 25 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany said in a speech that Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He founded the Juche idea, projecting the popular masses as the master of the revolution and construction and their own destiny, and built the genuine socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea, the chief noted, adding:
					
					 With no accusation and invective against the DPRK can the West deceive progressive mankind.
					
					 The DPRK will certainly prove truth that justice is sure to triumph.
					
					 The international secretary of the women's organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the tender-hearted father who devoted his all to the people, finding himself among them all his life.
					
					 The President was the great leader of the cause of global independence as he supported the Angolan and other African peoples in their struggle for national liberation and the building of a new society.
					
					 The Korean people led by HE Kim Jong Un will certainly win the final victory in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and reunify the country independently and peacefully.

articles.title: DPRK's important Anniversaries to Be Significantly Celebrated in Ghana
articles.content:
DPRK's important Anniversaries to Be Significantly Celebrated in Ghana
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The National Democratic Congress of Ghana will join the Korean people in significantly celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said this in a statement issued on March 26 in response to the appeal adopted at the 19th seminar of political parties of the world on building a new society.
					
					 He fully supported and hailed the appeal to the communist parties, workers' parties and progressive parties and the people of the world on behalf of the leadership of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana and on his own behalf.
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK the DPRK, a fraternal country, is shedding its bright rays as the ideal and beacon of hope of progressive mankind aspiring after the building of a peaceful and prospering new society, he said.
					
					 He noted that the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the guiding force of the times and mankind would always be remembered by the progressive people along with broad smile of the President and the leader.
					
					 Thanks to HE Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the WPK and the fraternal Korean people will surely achieve the final victory, he said.
					
					 He extended full support and solidarity to the just cause of the fraternal WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: UK Organizations Denounce U.S. Moves to Deploy THAAD in South Korea
articles.content:
UK Organizations Denounce U.S. Moves to Deploy THAAD in South Korea
 Pyongyang, March 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on March 26 to denounce the U.S. moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 THAAD to be deployed by the U.S. in south Korea at any cost is a very dangerous factor of extremely escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity, the statement said.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to deploy THAAD in south Korea to prepare a preemptive attack on the DPRK and use it as a means to contain Russia and China, its strategic rivals, it noted.
					
					 The deployment of THAAD is directly linked with the U.S. strategic aim to tighten its domination over south Korea and round off the formation of a military alliance of NATO style in Northeast Asia, it said.
					
					 The state of the Cold War is going on in Northeast Asia indefinitely due to this dangerous strategy of the U.S., it said, adding:
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK is bolstering up its deterrence to cope with the ever more increasing threat of the U.S.

articles.title: FDRP desenmascara la naturaleza de alianza EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FDRP desenmascara la naturaleza de alianza EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los títeres surcoreanos intensifican el servilismo proyanqui, el enfrentamiento fratricida y las maniobras bélicas contra la República Popular Democrática de Corea insistiendo en la alianza con EE.UU., el Comité Central del Frente Democrático para la Reunificación de la Patria (FDRP) hizo público el día 31 un memorando para revelar la naturaleza de la alianza EE.UU.-Sur de Corea. 
					El documento califica la alianza como la desigual entre el amo y el lacayo y la bélica favor de la política de agresión del imperio norteamericano, y continúa:
					
					El 8 de septiembre de 1945, el imperialismo norteamericano ocupó el suelo surcoreano, en lugar del imperialismo japonés derrotado en la segunda guerra mundial, promulgó la gobernación militar y practicó la dominación colonial mediante el gobernador general.
					
					Mediante las "elecciones por separado" celebradas en mayo de 1948, EE.UU. fabricó en agosto del mismo año el poder títere de Syngman Rhee.
					
					Los "convenios" y "tratados" de toda índole, concertados después de la aparición del poder títere surcoreano bajo la coerción e instigación de EE.UU., sirvieron para subyugar completamente el Sur de Corea en el plano político, el económico y el militar. 
					
					A fin de justificar el régimen de ocupación militar, EE.UU. inventó el 24 de agosto de 1948 el "convenio administrativo sobre los asuntos militares y de seguridad provisionales en el período transitorio" instigando al traidor Syngman Rhee. 
					
					En virtud de este "convenio", entregó al ejército surcoreano las municiones suficientes para armar a decenas de miles de efectivos, enorme cantidad de armas arrebatadas de los imperialistas japoneses, los aviones y buques de fabricación norteamericana para que prepare la guerra de agresión contra la RPDC. 
					
					Al provocar la guerra coreana el 25 de junio de 1950, inventó en julio de ese año el "convenio sobre la esfera jurisdiccional del ejército norteamericano en el Sur de Corea". De esta manera, tomó en sus manos el mando de operaciones y el control sobre el ejército surcoreano. 
					
					Pretextando ese convenio ilícito, incorporó al ejército títere surcoreano a las "fuerzas de la ONU" para que el "comandante" de estas fuerzas pudiera ejercer el mando sobre aquél. 
					
					El primero de octubre de 1953 fue firmado en Washington el "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea. 
					
					El capítulo IV del tratado atribuye a EE.UU. el derecho a desplegar en toda la extensión surcoreana las fuerzas armadas terrestres, navales y aéreas, mientras el capítulo VI "legalizó" la presencia perenne de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea al estipular que "el tratado es vigente por tiempo indefinido". 
					
					El tratado fue el leonino de peor contenido que distaba mucho de otros tratados pactados con otros países sobre el estacionamiento de las tropas norteamericanas. 
					
					En noviembre de 1954, EE.UU. fabricó "actas de acuerdos" como suplemento del "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea reafirmando su ocupación perpetua del territorio surcoreano.
					
					Durante 70 años transcurridos desde la ocupación del suelo surcoreano, la alianza EE.UU.-Sur de Corea registró la historia criminal y vergonzosa de agresión, guerra, saqueo y subyugación. 
					
					Ateniéndose a la "declaración conjunta" del gobierno títere surcoreano y la "comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU", publicada en mayo de 1961, EE.UU. aceleró los preparativos de guerra de agresión anti-RPDC manteniendo el mando de operaciones del comandante de las "fuerzas de la ONU" sobre el ejército surcoreano, invirtiendo enormes gastos en el aumento armamentista e intensificando los ejercicios bélicos. 
					
					Y lanzó a los efectivos surcoreanos mercenarios como carnes de cañón para las guerras de agresión desatadas por doquier del mundo. 
					
					El 9 de julio de 1966, fabricó el "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea que permite a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea tener las prerrogativas nunca vistas en otras partes del mundo. 
					
					Cobijadas por el "acuerdo", las tropas yanquis cometen sin vacilación alguna en el suelo surcoreano los crímenes de toda índole, tales como el homicidio, la violación sexual, el saqueo y el sabotaje. 
					
					En diciembre de 1994, el imperio orquestó la farsa de entregar a los títeres el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de paz con el astuto intento de calmar el ambiente por la independencia antiyanqui de la población surcoreana y las críticas internas y externas sobre la ocupación del territorio surcoreano y la gobernación colonial.
					
					Declaró que entregaría en abril de 2012 el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra. Sin embargo, tras fabricar el "poder" conservador proyanqui, le instigó a aplazar repetidamente el tiempo de su transferencia. 
					
					A través de la engañosa "ayuda", intensificó el sistema de gobernación neocolonial sobre la economía surcoreana.
					
					A mediados de la década de 1960, tomó en su mano el presupuesto financiero y la mayoría del capital del Sur de Corea y monopolizó 70-80% del suministro de materias primas y el 80% del volumen comercial.
					
					Con la apertura de mercados norteamericanos, profundizó la penetración y la dependencia económicas del Sur de Corea.
					
					Al inventar el "Tratado de Libre Comercio", colonizó más a los títeres surcoreanos.
					
					Apoyándose en la alianza con EE.UU., la banda conservadora surcoreana realiza el último esfuerzo por mantener su sucia y precaria vida.
					
					Lo que hizo hasta ahora el actual poder surcoreano es haber subyugado más el Sur de Corea al imperio abogando por la alianza y llevado a la fase catastrófica las relaciones íntercoreanas mediante la confabulación conflictiva y las maniobras bélicas contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					Mientras exista esa alianza, la población surcoreana no podrá liberarse de desgracias.
					
					Nunca se eliminará el peligro de guerra en la Península Coreana ni se podrá esperar la paz y la reunificación del país.
					
					Debe ser disuelta ahora mismo la alianza EE.UU-Sudcorea, vergüenza de la nación y obstáculo para la paz y reunificación.

articles.title: Se hara frente rotundo a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles: afirma el CRPP
articles.content:
Se hara frente rotundo a la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de fuerzas hostiles: afirma el CRPP
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, en la 28a reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, Estados Unidos y sus satelites aprobaron otra vez la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que insulta la dignidad y el regimen de esta. En esta farsa tomo parte activa la banda titere surcoreana, hecho que pone sumamente indignada a toda la nacion coreana.
					Al anunciar abiertamente que se ofrecio como "co-proponente" del proyecto de resolucion anti-RPDC, la camarilla surcoreana dijo unos disparates atrevidos tales como "apoya la aprobacion de ese 'proyecto'", "espera el papel constante y activo del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en el problema de DDHH del Norte de Corea" y "ejecucion de los articulos recomendados".
					
					Ademas, expuso el intento de instalar en un futuro cercano en Seul la llamada "oficina de DDHH del Norte" que se encargaria de recrudecer la campana internacional de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.
					
					En la informacion no.1088 publicada el dia 30, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria denuncio lo susodicho como crimen antinacional mas asqueroso que puede cometer solo la banda traidora surcoreana enloquecida en la confrontacion fratricida y como otra provocacion imperdonable y desafio frontal a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC.
					
					El "proyecto de resolucion de DDHH del Norte de Corea", aprobado esta vez por la fuerza por EE.UU. y sus seguidores en el Consejo de DDHH de la ONU, es un documento politicamente fraudulento para manchar la dignidad y el prestigio de la RPDC y el intrigante y agresivo para derrocar el regimen de ella, insistio la nota y continuo:
					
					La chismografia de los titeres surcoreanos sobre el supuesto "problema de DDHH" de alguien es el climax de descaro.
					
					Lo que debe ser cuestionado es el estado de violacion de DDHH de EE.UU. y su colonia Sur de Corea.
					
					Es el Sur de Corea donde se tilda de "terrorista" el que ejecuto el castigo justo en rebeldia a los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y se someten a la brutal represion los que se califican de "fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" por haber elogiado a esta parte connacional y reclamado la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					Como ya fue revelado a traves de la confesion de los espias del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea que fueron capturados en la RPDC, la banda surcoreana no vacila en cometer, bajo el control trasero de EE.UU, hasta el acto terrorista contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y su regimen. Si se toma en cuenta este hecho, la acusacion de ellos es un insulto y burla imperdonables para la RPDC.
					
					No perdonaremos jamas la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana y les haremos frente rotundo sin perdonarla ni un apice.
					
					Sobre todo, no estaremos con brazos cruzados ante las pretensiones de convertir el territorio surcoreano en el foco de crimenes intrigantes anti-RPDC al instalar en Seul la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" bajo el cartel de la ONU.
					
					Desde el momento en que se instale ese antro de conspiracion, sera blanco de nuestro castigo implacable y primer ataque.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la sesion del Comite Olimpico de RPDC
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la sesion del Comite Olimpico de RPDC
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 31 la sesion del Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea-El 104 (2015) de la Era Juche.
					En la ocasion participaron los miembros del Comite Olimpico y los funcionarios del sector deportivo y los otros relacionados.
					
					En la reunion balancearon el trabajo del Comite Olimpico del ano pasado y debatieron la direccion de su trabajo en este ano.
					
					Hubo el informe del ministro de Deportes Kim Yong Hun, quien es presidente del Comite Olimpico de la RPDC, y discursos.
					
					Los oradores mencionaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un hizo convocar la 7a Conferencia Nacional de Deportistas, envio el mensaje historico "Abramos una nueva era de prosperidad en la construccion de una potencia deportiva con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu" a los participantes en la conferencia y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					Subrayaron que en el ano pasado, los deportistas glorificaron la patria y estimularon mucho al ejercito y pueblo, que se levantaron en la batalla de defensa del socialismo, al lograr victorias en los XVII Juegos Asiaticos y los campeonatos mundiales.
					
					Recordaron que a traves de la competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-14 y otros torneos deportivos nacionales, se ha levantado la ola deportiva en todo el pais y se han logrado muchos exitos en el sector de investigacion cientifica de deportes.
					
					Continuaron que se esforzaran por desarrollar los deportes masivos y el nivel tecnico de las disciplinas deportivas.
					
					Los oradores exhortaron a intensificar la colaboracion con las organizaciones deportivas internacionales y lograr mayores exitos en la rama.

articles.title: Organizaciones de masas sostienen reuniones ampliadas de pleno
articles.content:
Organizaciones de masas sostienen reuniones ampliadas de pleno
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 31 en esta capital y la ciudad de Phyongsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur las reuniones ampliadas de la 56a sesion plenaria del CC de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, la 78a sesion plenaria del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) y la 70a sesion plenaria del CC de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC).
					  En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los miembros y los miembros suplentes de los comites centrales de las entidades mencionadas y los funcionarios de la capital y las provincias.
					
					  En las reuniones fue debatido el problema de materializar a toda costa las tareas programaticas presentadas en el historico discurso resumen que pronuncio el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Hubo los informes de Jon Yong Nam, presidente del CC de la UJS, Hyon Sang Ju, presidente del CC de la FGSC y Kim Jong Sun, presidenta del CC de la UMDC, y las intervenciones.
					
					  Los oradores subrayaron que el discurso resumen del Mariscal deviene la guia programatica y bandera combativa a ser mantenida firmemente por el pueblo coreano en la lucha por materializar el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Analizaron e hicieron balance de los exitos y experiencias logrados en los ultimos 3 anos en que desarrollaron una intensa lucha por materializar cabalmente el legado del Dirigente en pleno acato a la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					  Igualmente, se refirieron a las tareas y remedios de las organizaciones de masas para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el historico discurso resumen.

articles.title: Emitidos en RPDC nuevos sellos
articles.content:
Emitidos en RPDC nuevos sellos
Pyongyang, 31 de marzo (ACNC) -- Recientemente, la Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea emitio un nuevo sello que llama a materializar las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y de la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, publicadas con motivo del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y de la fundacion del PTC.
					En el sello esta dibujado un constructor militar decidido a materializar las consignas conjuntas y en el trasfondo se ven el emblema del PTC y las banderas en que estan escritas las palabras "Campana de materializacion de la idea del Partido" y "Campana de defensa de las politicas del Partido".
					
					En la parte abajo se lee la consigna "!Acojamos con elevado fervor politico y brillantes exitos laborales el septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la Patria y de la fundacion del Partido!".
					
					El sello muestra bien la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de avanzar a pasos firmes hacia la plaza de conmemoracion de victoria correspondiendo al llamamiento del Partido.
